summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image shows a video game interface for crafting weapons. It features the "Loongwreathe Staff," classified as an epic weapon with an attack value of 70. The staff has a unique effect that moderately increases the damage dealt by all Pillar Stance moves. The crafting menu indicates insufficient materials to craft the weapon, listing specific requirements: Thunderbone (1/1), Refined Iron Sand (2/4), and Will (20567/21000). The right side of the image displays character stats, including health, attack, and defense, with some values highlighted in green and red to indicate increases and decreases. A character holding the staff is partially visible, along with a cryptic text: "The loong slain dead with sword's swift lunge, into the void its head did plunge."
